name: Carrier
description: With 'Assault Mode' and 'Ammo Case' as default Precepts, Carrier is a seeker Sentinel. Carrier also comes with a shotgun weapon.Note: This item requires two open slots.

name: Diriga
description: Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the 'Calculated Shot', 'Arc Coil' and 'Electro Pulse' precepts.Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Alloy Plate
components.description: Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.Locations: Venus, Phobos, Ceres, Jupiter, Pluto, and Sedna.

components.name: Argon Crystal
components.description: A Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the Void.This resource can be found in the Void.

components.description: Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the 'Calculated Shot', 'Arc Coil' and 'Electro Pulse' precepts.Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Plastids
components.description: A disgusting nanite-infested tissue mass.Locations: Phobos, Saturn, Uranus, Pluto, and Eris.

components.description: A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.Locations: Mercury, Venus, and Uranus.

name: Djinn
description: With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Circuits
components.description: Various electronic components.Locations: Venus, Ceres, and the Kuva Fortress.

components.name: Forma
components.description: This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe, Companions or Weapon and then resets their affinity to Unranked. This can only be used on Level 30 Warframes, Companions and Weapons.

components.name: Mutagen Mass
components.description: This living mass can produce weaponized toxins for weaponry.Can be acquired from Infestation Outbreaks & Clan Research.

components.name: Salvage
components.description: High value metals collected from war salvage.Locations: Mars, Jupiter, and Sedna.

name: Helios
description: With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Ferrite
components.description: Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.Locations: Mercury, Earth, Lua, Neptune, and the Void.

components.name: Fieldron
components.description: ClanTech weaponized containment field to contain superheated substances.Can be acquired from Corpus Sieges & Clan Research.

components.name: Oxium
components.description: Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin, used in certain Corpus Robotics.Locations: Venus, Jupiter, Mars, Neptune, Pluto, Eris, Europa, and Lua.

name: Helios Prime
description: This knowledge hungry protector defends its master with Deconstructor Prime.

name: Oxylus
description: With 'Scan Aquatic Lifeforms' and 'Scan Matter' as default Precepts, Oxylus was designed to assist in Search-and-Rescue operations through the harsh landscape around The Orb Vallis. Oxylus also comes with a Multron rifle.Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Axidrol Alloy
components.description: A compound formed from Axidite.

components.description: With 'Scan Aquatic Lifeforms' and 'Scan Matter' as default Precepts, Oxylus was designed to assist in Search-and-Rescue operations through the harsh landscape around The Orb Vallis. Oxylus also comes with a Multron rifle.Note: This item requires two open slots.

components.name: Goblite Tears
components.description: Polished and cut to perfection.

components.name: Longwinder Lathe Coagulant
components.description: A liquid that mixes with coolant fluid to produce a resilient gel that repairs leaks.Acquired by disassembling Longwinder Servofish.

components.name: Scrap
components.description: A sample of sprockets, gyros and wires.Acquired by disassembling any Servofish.

name: Prisma Shade
description: A rare jewel of the void. How could anything so beautiful be crafted for stealth?

name: Shade
description: With 'Revenge' and 'Ghost' as default Precepts, Shade is well suited for stealth gameplay. Shade also comes with a burst laser pistol.Note: This item requires two open slots.
